name: Thrive in Chaos
description: Slash enemies in front of you, causing them to bleed for 6965 Bleed Damage over 8 seconds and healing you for 50% of the damage done.  Each enemy hit increases your damage done by 6% for the duration.  This effect can stack up to 6 times.
effectLines: Converts into a conal attack.  Each enemy hit increases your damage done.
coefDescription: Slash enemies in front of you, causing them to bleed for $1 Bleed Damage over 8 seconds and healing you for 50% of the damage done.  Each enemy hit increases your damage done by 6% for the duration.  This effect can stack up to 6 times.
